dcterms:creator: Antoine Bordes
Y-Lan Boureau
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The bAbI Tasks consist of synthetic dialog tasks designed to evaluate dialog systems. In this paper, Task1 and Task2 are used to assess the performance of Seq2Seq models in a simulated restaurant reservation application, where the user interacts with an agent by providing constraints and the agent performs external actions or queries.
dcterms:title: bAbI Tasks (Task1 and Task2)

dcterms:description: An internal customer support dataset consisting of chat transcripts where agents respond to customer inquiries. The dataset includes various issues categorized into 31 possible categories, with a focus on account-related issues.
dcterms:title: Internal customer support dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow
I. Serban
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: The Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus is a large dataset designed for research in unstructured multi-turn dialogue systems. It contains conversations from the Ubuntu chat platform, providing a rich source of dialog data for training and evaluating dialog systems.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus
